summary: This is a UBS bank account opening document for the 'Angara Trust', an irrevocable trust established on September 15, 2016. The document identifies Ghislaine Maxwell as the contact for the trust and provides account risk profile and investment objective details.

persons.name: Ghislaine Maxwell
persons.context: Listed as the contact for the Angara Trust in the account opening documents with UBS.

events.title: Angara Trust Established
events.description: The Angara Trust, an irrevocable trust, was formally established.

events.title: UBS Account Opening for Angara Trust
events.description: Account opening documents were processed for the Angara Trust at UBS, specifying an aggressive risk profile and an investment objective of income and capital appreciation.

locations: Boston, MA 02210-2698 (Residential address listed for trust contact)
keyFacts: Ghislaine Maxwell is identified as the contact for the 'Angara Trust', an irrevocable trust established in September 2016.
The trust opened an account at UBS with an 'Aggressive' risk profile, seeking high returns.
The document is dated November 7, 2016, indicating financial activity involving Maxwell after Jeffrey Epstein's 2008 conviction.
The trust's investment objective was to produce a combination of income and capital appreciation.
The document includes standard financial compliance questions regarding affiliations with securities firms and status as a senior political official.
